item.title: The Reddest Rose Unfolds
item.description: I few weeks ago I decided to set up a personal blog, aimed primarily at software development topics, but possibly also containing one or another post about my other interests; climbing/bouldering and writing and performing music. Starting with this post, the blog is now up.
